website_summaries.verdict: The Omega’s sturdy 4-bolt grip, wide range of compatible sizes, and ultra-sturdy design make this bike stem a great option, especially when you consider its low price.
cons: Although it is excellent that the Omega was made in an assortment of sizes, prices for specific configurations vary wildly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and fit
customer_reviews.text: Had initially been running a 100mm stem with +12 degrees of rise but wanted to level out the rise without increasing reach. As with most fsa products I've used, they're consistent performers. By positioning this stem on the -6 setting, I was able to flatten the stem rise and only increase reach by 1mm. In terms of construction, it is a good machined piece of aluminum and comes with the required screws. The 4 bolt bar attachment appears secure when tensioned to 6nm as indicated.
customer_reviews.author: randumtasx

customer_reviews.title: Everything you thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: If you're throwing this on a road bike, the 60mm is a touch squirly. Best to get an 80mm and some compact drop bars if you bought a frame to large. It's looks good, light, and just enough room for a cycling computer if you want to strap it on (the 60mm). Just as good as any one lighter weight stem I've ever bought. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Loverme

customer_reviews.title: Adjust your bike, fine tuning increases comfort
customer_reviews.text: Proper bike fit is the key to cranking out long rides. My existing stem was too long. Shifted my bidy weight to my hands, to much pressure, numbness after 2-3 hrs riding. Slightly shorter stem, body more upright, weight transferred to pedals. Increased power, reduced hand fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: gnac

customer_reviews.title: My go-to stem
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably light-weight, well made and reasonably priced. I bought a few different sizes for myself and for friends' bikes. If you need a new stem - I don't see any good reason to pay several times over for a carbon stem that weight only a few grams less, or from a trendy brand that is not any lighter at all.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: While this doesn’t look as fancy as some it gets the job done. I’ve used 3T and Specialized and for the money you can’t beat this stem. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: DavidDoesReviews

customer_reviews.title: Very light and a nice price and it hold's the bar in place (very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and a nice price and it hold's the bar in place (very important feature) what else could i expect .
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzyknuckles

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after one of the very cheap alternatives sold on Amazon arrived with subpar quality. This FSA piece is solid, plus it matched the rest of the finishing kit on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Quality Stem
customer_reviews.text: Quality stem. Although I got the very long 130mm one, i never feel like it's not going to hold up when I'm really cranking on the handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This stem is well made and smoothly finished. It's relatively light for an alloy stem at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, looks and feels good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks good, works well, lightweight. Solid angle for up or slammed. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Demietrich Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal works as good as the high dollar ones.
customer_reviews.author: TBunch42

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I went from a FSA 70mm to this FSA 100mm. I can now stay aerodynamic without excessive elbow bend .
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Sheetoo

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of price, a very good stem.
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and light like much more expensive brands. Compared with my previous Ritchey (17 degrees, that's why I replaced by this), feels about the same weight and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty nice but one of the screws broke while I was tightening the stem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built solid stem
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement if you need to change the giometry of your bike. Well made very solid feel with little weight.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Thomson stem that developed cracks and was out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced Thomson stem that developed cracks and was out of warranty. Performance seems similar to Thomson. Slightly less dampening. Geometry very similar. Intend on using as backup once replaced with new Thomson stem.
customer_reviews.author: stickygdm

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good. It is different from other cheap Chinese products
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. It is different from other cheap Chinese products. It already has blue Loctite on the threads.
customer_reviews.author: White Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Nice stem, light for the length
customer_reviews.text: Nice stem, light for the length, got here fast which was great since I goofed and had bought another that was all wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Rome

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, solid stem. Made in Taiwan, which is the mecca of the bicycle industry. Reliable quality.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected wish it came with a top cap but other then that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent handlebar stem that is well made and as advertised. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Beware that the sizes for these stems are measured from ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware that the sizes for these stems are measured from edge to edge of the whole stem. This is confusing as usually stems are measured center hole to center hole. I have to return mine and they don't make an actual 110mm center-to-center. Otherwise it looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Erik P

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my original stem which put me too far forward.. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Akeji Morinaga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a good looking stem, lightweight at a reasonable price. It was delivered sooner than expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on anything more expensive. Light, solid and looks great! Photo - Cannondale 110mm vs FSA 90mm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid stem!
customer_reviews.text: Its a stem, works great, bolt heads are solid, light enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get the 90mm for $30. An absolute bang for your buck! I actually replaced a $75 Bontrager stem with this FSA because it is just as light and 1/2 the price. If you're not a weight weenie and want a quality stem for an affordable price buy the FSA Omega!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Really made my bike more comfortable to ride for longer periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Really made my bike more comfortable to ride for longer periods of time. Not heavy either
customer_reviews.author: Antonino

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: There's really just so much you can say about a stem. Seems solid and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: eyes N ears

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stem, Ive recently change out my factory Oval handlebar that came with my Fuji Altamira 2.0 to aero full carbon handlebar. The original oval stem was aluminum 120cm which was uncomfortable because aero extend reach out another 2cm. I've ended up deciding on 90cm which was perfect fit. I am 6'2" 207lbs and find this stem to be good. I would have given it 5 star if I didn't find a very slight bit play even though I've tighten the stem cap per recommended torque 5-6NM.
customer_reviews.author: Hue Chau

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered an 60 mm stem and i have received a 100mm stem. That ia a huge mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Valdez

product_meta.title: FSA Omega V14 Ahead Stem-Black, 80 mm
product_meta.description: 3D forged then CNC machined from AL6061/T6 4-bolt cold forged alloy faceplate Cr-Mo steel hardware 6x60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120 or 130mm 40mm fork clamp diameter Sandblasted black anodized Printed graphics 139g (100mm)
feature_bullets: Material: [body] 6061 T6 aluminum, [face plate] alloy, [hardware] chromoly steel
